name: Quick, Homemade Hamburger Soup
author: Chrisie
summary: This is my favorite soup ever! It's what I make most often for myself and my daughter and it is soOo easy. During spring we use vegetables from the garden but the easiest way is just using regular canned produce. It's wonderful either way you choose.
ingredients: 1 (14.5 ounce) can French style green beans, undrained
salt and black pepper to taste
directions: Heat a large pot over medium-high heat, and stir in the ground beef
Cook until the beef is crumbly, evenly browned, and no longer pink
Drain, and discard any excess grease
Stir in the potatoes, carrots, green beans, corn, tomatoes, tomato sauce, and water
Bring the soup to a boil over high heat
Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until the potatoes are tender, about 20 minutes
Season to taste with salt and pepper
